translated: “Come, student, let’s go to the river

analyzed: thullamattham jahissasi  bhikkham te na āharissanti
translated: you’ll give up what’s so much?🔽People, thinking you’re dead,
pure, excellent, and full of flavor,
the person who brings you almsfood here
will be very hard to find, when I’ve eaten you.”
“I have a use for you, Sutanu,
go in safety to see your mother.
Take the sword, the parasol, and the fan,
May your mother see you in safety,
and may you see your mother.”
“In this way, Yakkha, may you be happy,
and I have done what the king said.”
The Birth Story of Sutanu (3rd) is finished.
